hakataPort.subtitle: AI Voice Communication System for Maritime Traffic Control
hakataPort.description: AI supports VHF wireless communication between ships and control towers. Real-time voice recognition and generation enable safe and efficient maritime traffic.
hakataPort.imoSmcpValue: Supports International Maritime Organization Standard Protocol

careCopilot.title: Implementation Example: Care Copilot
careCopilot.subtitle: IoT Care Monitoring System for the Elderly
careCopilot.description: Ensuring the safety of the elderly while respecting privacy. Monitor fall detection and bed exit using ToF distance sensors without cameras, and immediately notify caregivers via LINE notifications.
careCopilot.hardwareValue: M5Stack Fire + ToF distance sensor + environmental sensor
careCopilot.locationTrackingValue: Ensuring safety when going out with GPS function

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We answer frequently asked questions from our customers

poc.question: How is PoC (Proof of Concept) carried out?

answer.intro: PoC is carried out in the following 5 stages:
steps: Hearing - Detailed investigation of issues and requirements (1-2 weeks)
PoC Proposal - Optimal solution proposal (1 week)
Effect Verification - ROI and effect measurement (2-4 weeks)
Main Development - Full-scale system construction (3-12 months)
answer.conclusion: Since we confirm the effects at each stage before proceeding to the next, we can minimize risks.

answer.intro: We pay maximum attention to security:

dataProtection.title: üîí Data Protection & Privacy
